document_data.caption: A map showing Buckle Alley and surroundings in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Buckle Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Buckle Alley''' was an alley that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Buckle Alley was located in the eastern section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]]. It originated in the east on the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] on the border with the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] where it branched west through the Sea Ward, crossing the [[Street of Bells]], the [[Street of the Sword]], and [[Warrior's Way]] before terminating on the [[Street of Silver]].
document_data.History: The alley was named for guards being reminded to buckle their [[sword]] belts before stepping foot onto the alley as it was once the home of the [[Shadow Thieves]] in Waterdeep.
